import React, { Component } from 'react' export class BonusDetailItem extends Component { render() { return (
{this.props.item.bonuses}s
{this.props.item.rate}
{this.props.item.maxAmaunt}
ⓘ
Get the bonus
Bonus valid for:
{this.props.item.bonusValid}
Wagering condition:
{this.props.item.wageringCondition}
Wager:
{this.props.item.wager}
Cashable Bonus:
{this.props.item.cashableBonus}
Cash Bonus:
{this.props.item.cashBonus}
) } } export default BonusDetailItem
